attributes.action: Make learning English compulsory for non english speaking immigrants to this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If an individual leaves their own country to come to the U.K, it is only right that this person is obliged to learn English in order to increase the likelihood of them getting a job and so not being dependent on hand outs from the state. It wou also decrease social and ethnic isolation and encourage integration into British society.
